channel.title: Ozan Bulut
channel.description: This theme is disigned based on Mailbox Blog, and licensed under MIT. This theme is also default theme for new site created by Jekyll Writer.

item.title: Welcome to Jekyll!
item.description:
Itâ€™s a long time question for me, what default theme of Jekyll Writer looks like? Days ago, Mailbox had gone. Today I copied the design of Mailbox official blog for our default theme to remember this great app. Thanks Mailbox team.

This theme is published under MIT License, I hope you may like it =)
